mapper.select: SELECT PK_USER_SEQ AS pkUserSeq, PK_AUTH_SEQ AS pkAuthSeq, USER_ID AS userId, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, PHONE AS phone, BIRTHDAY AS birthday, ADDRESS AS address, DETAILED_ADDRESS AS detailedAddress, EMAIL AS email, USER_DIVN AS userDivn, USE_YN AS useYn, REGIST_DT AS registDt FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PASSWORD = #{password} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
